skills.name: Ice Horn
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and Freezes the target for 1 turn with a 25% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Freeze
skill_effect.description: Enemy is frozen and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 1.8*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Fierce Charge
skills.description: Attacks the enemy to Provoke for 1 turn with a 75% chance and counterattacks the enemy for 2 turns whenever you're attacked. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.multiplier_formula: 3.0*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Protection Wings (Passive)
skills.description: Increases Defense for 2 turns when you're attacked by an enemy. This effect only activates once a turn. [Automatic Effect]

skills.name: Transformation: Human Form
skills.description: Transforms into a Human Form and you'll be able to use a new skill. The Attack Speed will be increased proportionate to your MAX HP in Human Form, but your MAX HP will be decreased by 30%. Instantly gains another turn after the transformation.
